price: Janganlah kamu sedih oleh perkataan mereka.  Sesungguhnya kekuasaan itu seluruhnya adalah kepunyaan Allah.  Dia-lah Yang Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًاۚ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥzunka qawluhum inna al-ʿizata lillahi jamīʿan huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
